receipts.Name: Spaghetti with tomato sauce
receipts.Author: Unknown
Instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add diced tomatoes to the saucepan and simmer for 10-15 minutes, until the sauce thickens.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the tomato sauce over cooked spaghetti.

receipts.Name: Grilled cheese sandwich
receipts.Author: Unknown
Instructions: Heat a skillet or griddle over medium heat.
Spread butter on one side of each slice of bread.
Place a slice of cheese between two slices of bread, buttered side facing out.
Place the sandwich on the skillet or griddle and cook until golden brown on each side, and the cheese is melted.
Repeat with remaining ingredients to make additional sandwiches.

receipts.Name: Scrambled eggs with spinach and cheese
receipts.Author: Unknown
Instructions: In a bowl, whisk together eggs, salt, and pepper.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and add chopped spinach. Cook until wilted.
Pour the whisked eggs over the spinach and cook, stirring occasionally, until the eggs are set.
Sprinkle shredded cheese over the scrambled eggs and cook until melted.
Serve hot.

receipts.Name: Chicken stir-fry with vegetables
receipts.Author: Unknown

Ingredients.Chicken: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, sliced

Instructions: In a wok or large skillet, heat vegetable oil over high heat.
Add sliced chicken and cook until browned and cooked through.
Add minced garlic and sliced vegetables to the skillet and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Pour soy sauce over the chicken and vegetables and stir to combine.
Serve hot over cooked rice.

receipts.Name: Caesar salad
receipts.Author: Unknown
Instructions: In a large salad bowl, toss together torn lettuce, croutons, and grated Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle Caesar dressing over the salad and toss to coat evenly.
Serve immediately.

receipts.Name: Beef stew with potatoes and carrots
receipts.Author: Unknown
Instructions: In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat.
Add cubed beef and brown on all sides.
Add minced garlic, diced onions, diced potatoes, sliced carrots, and beef broth to the pot.
Bring the stew to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 1.5-2 hours, until the beef is tender and the vegetables are cooked through.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot.

receipts.Name: Pasta primavera
receipts.Author: Unknown
Instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sliced vegetables to the skillet and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Toss cooked pasta with the stir-fried vegetables until well combined.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot.

receipts.Name: Fish tacos
receipts.Author: Unknown
Instructions: Season fish fillets with salt and pepper.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook fish fillets for 3-4 minutes per side, until cooked through.
Warm tortillas in a skillet or microwave.
Assemble tacos by placing cooked fish on warmed tortillas and topping with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, sliced avocado, lime slices, and chopped cilantro.
Serve hot.

receipts.Name: Vegetable stir-fry with tofu
receipts.Author: Unknown
Instructions: In a wok or large skillet, heat vegetable oil over high heat.
Add cubed tofu and cook until golden brown on all sides.
Add minced garlic and sliced vegetables to the skillet and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Pour soy sauce over the tofu and vegetables and stir to combine.
Serve hot over cooked rice.

receipts.Name: Caprese salad
receipts.Author: Unknown
Instructions: Alternate slices of tomato and mozzarella cheese on a serving platter.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the tomato and cheese slices.
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately.
